channel.title: Need command making a ::pure command

item.title: Need command making a ::pure command
item.dc:creator: @alijon alijon
item.description:
@alijon wrote:

[quote=“thewindman78, post:5, topic:386922”] if (playerCommand.startsWith("pure") && c.pure == 0) { int i = 0; c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 6); c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.pure = 1; } this is one per ip works on my server…[/quote]

Thanks bro it works The source I use req’s every commands to have a players right so i put it c.playerRights >= 0)

item.title: Need command making a ::pure command
item.dc:creator: @outrageouscape outrageouscape
item.description:
@outrageouscape wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pure") && c.playerRights >= 2) { if (c.inWild()) return; c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[0] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); c.playerXP[2] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[2] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(2); c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.playerXP[4] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[4] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(4); c.playerXP[6] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[6] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(6); }

I can’t remember what skills that levels but ey!

Read full topic

item.title: Need command making a ::pure command
item.dc:creator: @alijon alijon
item.description:
@alijon wrote:

Can some body please make me a command called pure
here is some things I want it to have and some things I do not.

I want the command to give the following skills
•99 Strength
•99 Attack
•99 Hitpoint
•99 Range
•99 Magic

Things I want the command not to do
•Make it so the command only works one time for everyone
•Make it so they can not use it in pk

That is all if you need some info about what source I use here is some
•Source is Runefxd

Also here is what the ::master command looks like on my server

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && c.playerRights >= 2) { for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); } c.getPA().requestUpdates(); }

This command is admin or higher but remove the rights = 2 for the ::pure commands make it for players.

Read full topic
